entry.title: Block Size Increase
entry.summary: A discussion on the topic of a paper titled "The Economics of Bitcoin Transaction Fees" was held on May 6th, 2015 at 21:49:52 by Peter Todd. However, Thomas Zander pointed out an apparent flaw in the paper's comparison of block size in today's data-flow economy and zero-reward situation decades from now, which he believes will never exist at the same time unless Bitcoin fails.
